subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Carroll, who left U.S.C. soon before a scandal that led to N.C.A.A. probation, has ridden a 7-9 season into the playoffs — and won in the first round.
snippet: Carroll, who left U.S.C. soon before a scandal that led to N.C.A.A. probation, has ridden a 7-9 season into the playoffs — and won in the first round.
